content.question: The figure above represents a bent metal bar in front of a plane mirror. Which of the following correctly shows the image of the bar drawn behind the mirror?

choices.label: The figure shows the side view of a diagram showing a bent metal bar placed in front of a mirror. From top to bottom, the bent metal bar extends vertically downward initially, then bends downward and to the left, then extends vertically downward again. The mirror is to the left of the bar. There is a dashed horizontal line that passes through the center of the slanted portion of the bar and the mirror.

The figure shows the side view of a diagram showing a bent metal bar placed in front of a mirror. From top to bottom, the bent metal bar extends vertically downward initially, then bends downward and to the right, then extends vertically downward again. The mirror is to the left of the bar. There is a dashed horizontal line that passes through the center of the slanted portion of the bar and the mirror.

The figure shows the side view of a diagram showing a bent metal bar placed in front of a mirror. From top to bottom, the bent metal bar extends vertically downward initially for a short distance, then bends gradually downward and to the left for a short distance, then extends vertically downward again for a short distance. The mirror is to the left of the bar. There is a dashed horizontal line that passes through the center of the slanted portion of the bar and the mirror.

The figure shows the side view of a diagram showing a bent metal bar placed in front of a mirror. From top to bottom, the bent metal bar extends vertically downward initially, then bends steeply downward and to the left, then extends vertically downward again. The mirror is to the left of the bar. There is a dashed horizontal line that passes through the center of the slanted portion of the bar and the mirror.

content.answer: The figure shows the side view of a diagram showing a bent metal bar placed in front of a mirror. From top to bottom, the bent metal bar extends vertically downward initially, then bends downward and to the right, then extends vertically downward again. The mirror is to the left of the bar. There is a dashed horizontal line that passes through the center of the slanted portion of the bar and the mirror.
